name: Scratch 2.0 according to shinkansen (full)
description: THIS USERSTYLE DOES NOT UPDATE AND WILL NOT RECEIVE SUPPORT. Click here for more information on the changes pertaining to my userstyle. OLD DESCRIPTION: A huge change to the Scratch website as suggested by shinkansen in http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/25399772/ Screenshot does not reflect the most current update. The CSS on userstyles.org is a minified/production version of this project. Development (minimally commented, non-minified) CSS is available upon request at my Scratch user page. THIS IS A DANGER BUILD It includes experimental updates that may be broken or change in the future. Use with caution. THIS STYLE IS NOT ANYWHERE NEAR COMPLETE! Questions/comments/bug reports/want to contribute: Start a discussion on userstyles or (preferred) leave a comment on my Scratch profile. LOVE ME ON SCRATCH! http://scratch.mit.edu/users/jTron Leave a rating for extra love!
additional_info: OLD NOTES: [scroll down for changelog] known issues in this update: - There is no profile picture on projects - because there's none already on the page to put there. Using a placehold.it for now. - Sometimes, project editor is offset just a bit and there's a small bar at the top (?) of the page. It's under pretty rare circumstances, and I'm trying to track it down. - Certain areas may have holes in odd places, bars of weird colors, etc. project goals: - As close to original specifications as possible - As accessible, easy to navigate, and eye-friendly as possible - As few "!important"s (and other "cheaty" tricks) as possible todo: - [g] studio page - [g] project page - [g] user page - add setting for blue/white theme vb2.0d1 [CURRENT] [!DANGER] - began styling project page - major recolorings vb1.9: - minor search box position fixes and visual modifications - fix for cdn.scratch.mit.edu pages (no background) - updated "View all" on scratch news - correctly colored now vb.1.8a [SCREENSHOT/LOGGEDIN]: - fixed search box (only displayed on home page, now on all pages) vb.1.8: - added search box vb.1.7: (first public version / summary of all previous changes) - general styling for navigation bar - custom icons created for navigation bar - certain elements removed from navigation bar - general styling for footer - general styling sitewide (background, etc.) - certain elements removed from home page - general styling for scratch news - general styling for all headings - general styling for all carousel views:    = resized images    = hid all but five thumbnails    = overlayed titles    = hid specific information (may re-add?)    = removed scrollbars    = minor resizing (viewport, content, etc.) - general styling for discuss page    = fixed link colors on blue background
